cost_optimization.pricing: The user was on the $99/month plan and had 60% of their credits left, which should have lasted until June 5th, representing approximately 400,000 credits.
cost_optimization.tip_1: ElevenLabs free plan offers 10k characters each month.
cost_optimization.tip_3: doing Speech-To-Text via the web UI only gives you 12 minutes per month on the free plan, meanwhile via the API you get 2 hours and 30 minutes on the same free plan per month!
